channel.title: 4.8 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds
channel.description: Recent content in 4.8 series on Fsu0413's Original Qt builds

item.title: 4.8.7 for Windows
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note ODBC and SQLite (distributed with Qt) are built in the package using -plugin-sql-*** Note All builds have -openssl-linked, which means that OpenSSL is linked to Qt and is used for TLS Backend. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Dynamic / Shared Builds Windows-MSVC Qt4.8.7-Windows-x86-VS2010-20200104.7z Download: OSDN link SourceForge link Build Host:Windows XP SP3Toolchain Version:VS2010 SP1Notes: Windows-MinGW Qt4.

item.title: 4.8.7 for macOS
item.description: Important FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED Note SQLite (distributed with Qt) are built in the package using -plugin-sql-sqlite Note All builds have -openssl-linked, which means that OpenSSL is linked to Qt and is used for TLS Backend. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Note This build is done using an old compiler on an old macOS, and is unknown whether it can be run on newer systems.
